name: Cubey World
description:
This is a game all about getting to the strange and misshapen block at the end of each level. Each level will have its own unique look that makes it special. Make your way, through a desert, a forest, and even space itself in this platformer style game. There will be many areas to get through. Some will be relaxing. Some will push your skills. Either way, can you make it to the end?

This game was made in collaboration with Joshua Touzeau.  He does a lot of art whether it is 3D or on paper. He goes by Draineed in his art. For this game, he did both the art and the music!

I coded and put together the game in Unity.

We both really hope you all enjoy the game!
